page.title: 14Household Appliances
page.content: We carried out a survey of the use of household appliances in Ashley. Here are the results. Black and White Television.......77% Colour Television................93% Coffee Maker.....................56% Computer.........................45% Dishwasher.......................15% Electric Cooker..................25% Electric Fire....................73% Electric Kettle..................38% Food Mixer.......................93% Hair Drier.......................86% Hi-Fi System.....................97% Microwave Oven...................26% Radio...........................100% Refrigerator....................100%. Tumble Dryer.....................32% Vacuum cleaner...................36% Video Cassette Recorder..........52% Washing Machine..................99%
